item.title: Version 0.3.5b
item.description:
0.3.5b
Mostly a bug fix release.
  • Hopefully fixed #47 by making sure all nib files are in the same lproj directory. I can't reproduce the crash, so I can only guess that's the problem.
  • Fixed more issues when switching between characters when the Market Orders or Contracts view are active.
  • Doing a Copy while a skill plan or individual skills in a plan is selected now copies the skills to the clipboard. Both this and choosing the EVE text export from the gear icon produce output that should work when imported into the EVE client's skill queue.

item.title: Version 0.3.4b
item.description:
0.3.4b
  • Includes the Mosaic 1.0 database.
  • The Check for Update feature should now work, with new application and database updates being hosted on GitHub Pages.
  • Contracts and Market Orders are now stored in a local database.

item.title: Version 0.3.3b
item.description:
0.3.3b
  • Testing Sparkle updater only! Don't use this version!

Removed all display references to clone grades.

item.title: Version 0.3.2b
item.description:
0.3.2b
  • Proteus support.
  • Database updating improvements.
  • Removed clone grades.

How Vitality handles updating the database has been significantly simplified. On startup we only check if the current version is greater than or equal to the minimum version (hard coded in the app). If so, we do nothing. Otherwise we check both the included DB (if any) and the one pointed to by the database preference URL's. If the user chooses the 'Check for updates' menu option, Vitality will check both included and remote databases. In either case if there's a newer version available it will be used to update the database.

The included database is now up-to-date with the Proteus release.

The Database update window now has a cancel button.

Fixed a number of display issues with the skill, ship and module detail windows.

Removed all display references to clone grades.

item.title: Version 0.2.10
item.description:
0.2.10
  • Rubicon support.
  • Market orders and contracts.
0.2.9
  • Odyssey 1.1 support.
  • Fixed a few different bugs.
0.2.8
  • Restored right click context menu on skills, certificates, ships and modules in the skill planner.
  • Updated skill planner to clear the selected row correctly when switching tabs.
  • Fixed issue in the character sheet when hiding / revealing skill groups.
  • Added columns to the skill plan view for Primary and Secondary attributes (disabled by default).
  • Updated icons to use higher resolution versions.
  • Experimental system menu bar for quick look of current characters training queue (disabled by default).

item.title: Version 0.2.9
item.description:
0.2.9
  • Odyssey 1.1 support.
  • Fixed a few different bugs.
0.2.8
  • Restored right click context menu on skills, certificates, ships and modules in the skill planner.
  • Updated skill planner to clear the selected row correctly when switching tabs.
  • Fixed issue in the character sheet when hiding / revealing skill groups.
  • Added columns to the skill plan view for Primary and Secondary attributes (disabled by default).
  • Updated icons to use higher resolution versions.
  • Experimental system menu bar for quick look of current characters training queue (disabled by default).

item.title: Version 0.2.7
item.description:
Upgrading from 0.2.5? You will need to download and install manually.

To update you will need to manually download and overwrite your current copy: http://labs.sixones.com/vitality/builds/vitality-0.2.7.zip or see the EVE Online forums.


  • Updated database for Odyssey 1.0.0.

item.title: Version 0.2.6
item.description:
Once again, I've managed to screw up the update verification - third times a charm!

To update you will need to manually download and overwrite your current copy: http://labs.sixones.com/vitality/builds/vitality-0.2.6.zip or see the EVE Online forums.


  • Fixed certificates displaying null names.
  • Added support for exporting to text via the clipboard.
  • Added new plan options menu for importing, exporting and attribute setup.
  • Removed Planner menu from the main system menu.

item.title: Version 0.2.5
item.description:
Sorry all, screwed up the update verification

To update you will need to manually download and overwrite your current copy: http://labs.sixones.com/vitality/builds/vitality-0.2.5.zip or see the EVE Online forums.


  • Added error handling around API communication when trying to add an account.
  • Cleaned up compiler warnings in the code.
  • Updated public key to use the Vitality key for verifying updates.

item.title: Version 0.2.4
item.description:
• Updated API authentication to use EVE's new format.
  • Updated database structure for latest EVE content database support.
  • Added module listings to skill planner.
  • Removed file icon from displaying in main window.
  • Updated default toolbar layout to place characters on the right.
  • General UI layout improvements.
  • Updated skill, certificate and ship panels to stay open when Vitality loses focus.
  • Moved image hosting to the official EVE image server.
  • Fixed ship and module from displaying raw HTML.
